body: A shaky start to the World Social Forum in Dakar, Senegal: "At the first official day of the Forum, hundreds of participants from around the world were stranded as a result of the absence of a complete programme, inadequate and well-labelled venues, thus driving many event-organisers to either postpone or cancel planned events on February 7.
original_body: A shaky start to the World Social Forum in Dakar, Senegal: "At the first official day of the Forum, hundreds of participants from around the world were stranded as a result of the absence of a complete programme, inadequate and well-labelled venues, thus driving many event-organisers to either postpone or cancel planned events on February 7.
title: Senegal: Shaky start to Dakar WSF 2011

sentence: A shaky start to the World Social Forum in Dakar, Senegal: "At the first official day of the Forum, hundreds of participants from around the world were stranded as a result of the absence of a complete programme, inadequate and well-labelled venues, thus driving many event-organisers to either postpone or cancel planned events on February 7.
